attributes.long-description:
The most entertaining multiplayer action platform game of the year has just arrived! Enter the arena as one of the eight Atomic Ninjas and battle it out against other players and bots, online or locally!

Outsmart and outflank other players, upgrade your Super Abilities and use crazy ninja weapons and gadgets. Only the most malicious players win!

- Eight distinctive Atomic Ninjas to unlock.

- Six weapons & gadgets, each bringing unique gameplay possibilities.

- Eight Super Abilities, such as Invisibility and Super Speed, that will turn you into a stealthy ninja, an agile acrobat, or an unstoppable hulk!

- Six arenas full of danger, moving platforms, traps and hiding places that become your playing field where you can hunt and humiliate other players!

- Lots of game modes, including Deathmatch, Capture the Flag and Treasure Hunt.



1-4 players
256KB minimum save size
HDTV screen resolution: 720p, 1080i, 1080p
DUALSHOCK®3
Network Features
Network Players 2-4

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®3 systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.

attributes.name: Atomic Ninjas
